name: Cluster
summary: Cluster is a social platform based around bringing together players in a virtual space, allowing them to transcend physical constraints — you can access the different “worlds” in Cluster at any time, from anywhere in the world. These “worlds” are spaces created in the virtual world by Cluster and by fellow players, which are free and open to be explored by the curious wandering spirit. From beautiful, aesthetic worlds to activity-filled gaming worlds, there are plenty of options to choose...
